title: 玩家拥有/suicide自杀权限 怎么解决
author: Poison丶vivi

replies.author: 寂静人心
replies.txt_content:
这样应该就可以禁止自杀了吧？
/mangaddp builder -essentials.suicide

replies.author: h2310502033
replies.txt_content: 输入/mangdelp default（大部分默认组）或者Builder essentials.suicide 即可

replies.author: shend2002
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp builder Essentials.suicide
/mangdelp default Essentials.suicide
这2个指令打一打就行了
